properties.description: All are welcome! Free superfast wifi - Toilets - Baby changing - Pay it forward drinks available. We also have a selection of games and toys that can be used in Cornerstone. Join us every Thursday between 10am and 1pm for our weekly wellbeing caf√©.

properties.address: Currock House Community Centre, Carlisle, Cumbria CA2 4BS
properties.description: We are a community centre based in the heart of Currock. We provide many activities aimed at reducing social isolation across all ages and backgrounds. We also have a focus on health and wellbeing and always look to meet the needs of our local community.
properties.title: Currock House Community Centre
